testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent skips a content element that points to a non-existing file and shouldn't read the following content element.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can verify a cryptographic zip archive.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test that an empty defaultlocale attribute is ignored (and does not cause the widget to be treated as an invalid one).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test that the UA only checks the config files in the root of the widget package which are not in a locale folder.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test that the user agent rejects malformed XML.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can treat file names in the default start files table case-sensitively (and the file is named 'INdeX.html' in a locale folder).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can treat file names in the default start files table case-sensitively (and the file is named 'INdeX.HTM' in a locale folder).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can treat file names in the default start files table case-sensitively (and the file is named 'INdeX.htm' in the root of the widget package).

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can locate the icon at the root of the widget package.

description.post_condition: Get the $pkgid of bj.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the bj.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n $pkgid

step.step_desc: Install the widget with the command: pkgcmd -i -t wgt -q -p TESTER-HOME-DIR/content/tct/opt/tct-widget02-w3c-tests/widgetpackaging/w3c/bj.wgt
step.expected: Widget application is able to be installed successfully.

step.step_desc: Check the bj widget logo.
step.expected: To pass, the user agent must select black "PASS" on the round green background as the widget logo.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/Widget/Widget Packaging and XML Configuration
testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can locate the icon in a locale folder and at the root of the widget package.

step.step_desc: Check the bl widget logo.

testcase.purpose: Test if the UA can load default icons in the correct order.

description.post_condition: Get the $pkgid of cc.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -l, then uninstall the cc.wgt with the command : pkgcmd -u -t wgt -q -n $pkgid

step.expected: To pass, the widget can be started successfully and the screen shows "PASS" on green background.
